closed_opened_door.description: Close the opened door by swinging it to its locked, closed position.

close_microwave_door.description: Close the microwave door by swinging it to a closed position.

open_closed_door.description: Open the closed door by releasing its lock and swinging it to its open position.

closed_closed_door.description: Confirm the closed door is in its proper fully closed and locked position.

open_microwave_door.description: Open the microwave door by swinging it to an open position.

close_microwave_door.description: The door is already closed, nothing needs to be done.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the continuous knob to adjust microwave settings.

press_knob.description: Press the knob to confirm the microwave settings.

wipe_knob.description: Wipe the knob clean of any dirt or residues.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to maintain hygiene.

wipe_microwave_body.description: Wipe the microwave body clean to maintain hygiene and appearance.

full_cleanup.description: Perform full cleanup of microwave including body, knob and door.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the microwave body to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including the body, door, and knob.

open_and_rotate_knob.description: Open the microwave door and then rotate the knob for setting time or choosing a setting.
